author-notes.title: Article Information
author-notes.p: Open Access: This is an open access article distributed under the terms of the CC-BY License. Â© 2021 Sutton EJ et al. JAMA Network Open.
author-notes.corresp: Corresponding Author: Elizabeth J. Sutton, MD, Department of Radiology, Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center, 300 E 66th St, Suite 727, New York, NY 10065 ( suttone@mskcc.org).
author-notes.p: Author Contributions: Dr Sutton had full access to all of the data in the study and takes responsibility for the integrity of the data and the accuracy of the data analysis.
Concept and design: Sutton, Braunstein, El-Tamer, Powell, Norton, Sacchini, Morris.

Acquisition, analysis, or interpretation of data: Sutton, Braunstein, El-Tamer, Brogi, Hughes, Bryce, Gluskin, Woosley, Tadros, Sevilimedu, Martinez, Toni, Smelianskaia, Nyman, Razavi, Fung, Sedorovich, Sacchini, Morris.
Drafting of the manuscript: Sutton, Braunstein, Woosley, Sevilimedu, Martinez, Smelianskaia, Sedorovich, Sacchini.

Critical revision of the manuscript for important intellectual content: Sutton, Braunstein, El-Tamer, Brogi, Hughes, Bryce, Gluskin, Powell, Tadros, Toni, Nyman, Razavi, Norton, Fung, Sacchini, Morris.
Administrative, technical, or material support: Sutton, Braunstein, Bryce, Gluskin, Woosley, Martinez, Norton, Fung, Sedorovich, Morris.
Supervision: Sutton, Braunstein, El-Tamer, Gluskin, Powell, Tadros, Smelianskaia, Norton, Sacchini.

Conflict of Interest Disclosures: Dr Morris reported receiving funding from the Susan G. Komen Foundation and Grail Inc for breast cancer research not related to the present work. No other disclosures were reported.

Funding/Support: This work was partially supported by grant P30 CA008748 from the National Institutes of Health/National Cancer Institute and by grant RSCH1622 from the Guerbet/Radiological Society of North America (Dr Sutton).

Role of the Funder/Sponsor: The funders had no role in the design and conduct of the study; collection, management, analysis, and interpretation of the data; preparation, review, or approval of the manuscript; and decision to submit the manuscript for publication.

Additional Contributions: We thank Joanne Chin, MFA, ELS, who provided editorial assistance as part of her employment as a full-time senior editor at Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center. Ms Chin was financially compensated for her contribution.
Additional Information: Coauthor James D. Sedorovich, BS, died July 18, 2019.
